left.title: What Is the Keyword Magic Tool?
paragraphs: Our Keyword Magic Tool helps you discover the best keyword ideas. Unlike basic generators, it uses data, filters, and AI to find real opportunities for growth.
It’s also a better alternative to Google Keyword Planner — no ads needed, just keyword insights.

right.title: Why Use Our Keyword Tool?
paragraphs: Because it’s built on billions of real, fresh keywords and offers advanced filters to refine your SEO strategy.
We use real data, not guesses, so your research stays accurate and useful.
Plus, our AI insights make it simple to uncover hidden keyword opportunities.

metrics.title: Stay on Top of Key Metrics with Our Free Keyword Tool
left: Keyword search volume: Avg monthly searches.
Keyword difficulty: How hard it is to rank.
right: CPC: Average ad cost per click.
Number of results: Total ranking pages.
metrics.footer: These keyword metrics, with our filters, help you find hidden high-value keywords for SEO and PPC.

steps.title: How to Use This Keyword Tool
items: Enter a seed keyword related to your business.
Check keyword suggestions and pick relevant ones.
Look at search volume, difficulty, and intent to choose wisely.
Add your chosen keywords to content, titles, and tags.
